description: This Python script defines an asynchronous agent that uses the MCPTools to perform a search on the Brave MCP server, utilizing the Claude model from the agno library. It includes setup for environment variables, agent creation, and response printing, with a sample invocation to query the weather in Tokyo.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that manages models and tools to perform tasks asynchronously.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A model class representing the Claude model from Anthropic, used for natural language processing.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: A class providing tools to interact with the MCP server for search functionalities.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronous function that creates an MCPTools instance, sets up an agent with the Claude model, performs a search query, and prints the response.
